Description: We are excited to announce that Brickstone Real Estate Company is hiring for the position of SeniorProperty Consultant with 2 years of experience in the real estate industry. We are seeking a qualified candidate who has:1. Must have a minimum of 1/2 years of professional experience working in the real estate industry within Dubai,2. Fluency in English.3. Excellent organizational skills with outstanding interpersonal abilities4. Team Player with a positive attitude5. Strong negotiable and communication skills 6. A UAE Driving license is a mustThe ideal candidate will be responsible for finding prospective clients, understanding their criteria, and finding living spaces that fit these criteria. You will then negotiate rent and drive our buyers to close. Your entrepreneurial spirit will drive your success to Negotiate living space rent and close deals with client*This job is only commission-based role, we offer an attractive commission package starting with 65 % commission. *Skills
